def count_occurrences_in_pyramid_row(S, T, N):

    def kmp(s, t, lps):
        n = len(s)
        m = len(t)
        count = [0 for x in range(n)]
        i = 0
        j = 0
        while i < n:
            count[i] = count[i - 1]
            if t[j] == s[i]:
                i += 1
                j += 1
            if j == m:
                count[i - 1] += 1
                j = lps[j - 1]
            elif i < n and t[j] != s[i]:
                if j != 0:
                    j = lps[j - 1]
                else:
                    i += 1
        return count

    def lpsa(t, m):
        l = 0
        lps = [0 for i in range(m)]
        i = 1
        while i < m:
            if t[i] == t[l]:
                l += 1
                lps[i] = l
                i += 1
            elif l != 0:
                l = lps[l - 1]
            else:
                lps[i] = 0
                i += 1
        return lps
    n = len(S)
    m = len(T)
    lps = lpsa(T, m)
    one = kmp(S, T, lps)[-1]
    count = kmp(S + S, T, lps)
    two = count[-1]
    three = two + 2 * one
    v = N // n
    if v:
        ans = v * one + (v - 1) * three
        e = N % n
        ans += count[n - 1 + e] - count[n - 1]
    else:
        e = N % n
        ans = count[e - 1]
    return ans
